name: Chaotic Periodic
description:
How well do you know the periodic table of elements?  Chaotic Periodic is a 2D single player platform game, which challenges your chemistry knowledge and reflexes. Jump to avoid any nonmetal element. 

It has an infinite game play with a maximum of 3 lives. Press any key or cursor to jump, press twice for double jump. Hover from left to right over the cheatsheet, to refresh your memory about the elements if needed.

This minimalist game was developed by KaSurigan (developer/programmer) and Séverine Bouyssou (concept/designer) for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 248, which had the theme "Metal".  Our concept could also be expanded with the half metals and other elements. This game might contain some bugs, since it has been developed within 2 days.

Music "Welcome Home" by Jake Bradford-Sharp

Sound by Stuart Duffield
